Title: Exodus (1)
Plot: SG-1 helps to evacuate the Tok'ra to a new base -- but matters are complicated when a spy reveals their location to Apophis. The team attempts a daring plan to take out the Goa'uld's powerful fleet.
GuestStars: Peter Wingfield, Malik McCall, Kenton Reid, Paul Norman, Kirsten Williamson, Anastasia Bandey
